A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite the haters\, this was a galaxy changing installment! Things evolve- this catapulted the narrative forward; no one knew Carrie would pass away so they had big plans for her next time. They planted the seeds for more revelations in the future. Like long Star Wars fanatic here- I’m happy they’re breathing new life into Jedi lore. Haters and insult slingers need to write their own fan fiction if they think they’ve got the corner market on the intellectual property. It was a freaking fun movie.
